whatIsEOR.heading: What is Employer of Record (EOR)?
whatIsEOR.description: An Employer of Record (EOR) is a trusted third party that becomes the legal employer of your workforce in Sweden. While you direct the day-to-day work, we handle the legal, administrative, and compliance aspects of employment. This includes drafting employment contracts compliant with Swedish labor law, registering employees with Skatteverket (Swedish Tax Agency), managing payroll, tax withholdings, and social contributions, handling benefits, pensions, and insurance, and ensuring compliance with Swedish employment standards and EU regulations. For businesses, this means you can expand quickly into Sweden without incorporating a subsidiary or spending months on regulatory setup.

whyCompaniesUse.heading: Why Companies Use EOR Services in Sweden
whyCompaniesUse.intro: Sweden is one of the strongest economies in Europe, known for its innovation-driven markets, highly skilled workforce, and strong legal protections for employees. But for foreign companies, hiring staff in Sweden can be challenging due to the following reasons:

challenges.title: Complex Employment Laws
challenges.description: Sweden enforces strong worker rights under the Employment Protection Act (LAS).

challenges.title: Strict Tax Compliance
challenges.description: Employers must register with Skatteverket and manage PAYE tax deductions, pensions, and employer contributions.

challenges.title: Time-consuming Setup
challenges.description: Establishing a local entity (AB) can take months, delaying business expansion.

challenges.title: High Compliance Risks
challenges.description: Mistakes in payroll, tax, or benefits administration can result in penalties or disputes.

whyCompaniesUse.conclusion: Our EOR service solves these challenges by acting as your legal employer, letting you focus on growth while we manage compliance.

payrollProcess.heading: Payroll Services in Sweden - Full Process
payrollProcess.intro: Payroll in Sweden is highly regulated, and accuracy is crucial. Our payroll services are fully integrated with our EOR system to ensure smooth, compliant payments.

steps.title: Employee Setup
steps.description: Enter employee details into the portal: salary, benefits, pension, and deductions. Register with Skatteverket for PAYE taxes and social contributions.

steps.title: Monthly Payroll Processing
steps.description: Automated salary calculations including taxes, pensions, and insurance. Employer contributions (arbetsgivaravgifter) are calculated and reported. Compliance with collective bargaining agreements (if applicable).

steps.title: Salary Payments
steps.description: Direct bank deposits into employee accounts. Employees access digital payslips showing full breakdown of earnings and deductions.

steps.title: Tax Compliance
steps.description: Monthly tax filings to Skatteverket. Annual reporting of income statements for employees. Secure records stored in the portal for both employer and employee access.

steps.title: Benefits Administration
steps.description: Setup of pensions, health insurance, and parental leave benefits in line with Swedish standards. Automatic administration through the payroll system.
